commands.name: az iot du device log collect
commands.summary: Configure a device diagnostics log collection operation on specified devices.
commands.syntax:
az iot du device log collect --account
                             --agent-id
                             --instance
                             --lcid
                             [--description]
                             [--resource-group]
examples: az iot du device log collect -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --log-collection-id {log_collection_id} --description "North-wing device diagnostics" --agent-id deviceId=d0 --agent-id deviceId=d1
az iot du device log collect -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --log-collection-id {log_collection_id} --description "ML module diagnostics" --agent-id deviceId=d0 moduleId=m0

commands.name: az iot du device log list
commands.summary: List instance diagnostic log collection operations.
commands.syntax:
az iot du device log list --account
                          --instance
                          [--resource-group]
examples: az iot du device log list -n {account_name} -i {instance_name}

commands.name: az iot du device log show
commands.summary: Show a specific instance diagnostic log collection operation.
commands.syntax:
az iot du device log show --account
                          --instance
                          --lcid
                          [--detailed {false, true}]
                          [--resource-group]
examples: az iot du device log show -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --log-collection-id {log_collection_id}
